page.title: 07 STREET GAMES - CALNE
page.content: Something is always happening in our street whether it is something big like a fire or something small like a cat stuck up a tree, which happens a lot. We play a lot of different games like Curby, Pom pom or off ground tag. Pom pom is a game like Hide and seek only you have a post and while the person who is "on" it is looking for the other people one of them can run to the post and say "Pom pom 1,2,3, and in" and that person is in. If the person who is "on" it sees someone they both run to the post and if the catcher gets there first he says "Pom pom 1,2,3 and out" and he or she is out.Curby is a game for two teams of any number .One on each side of the road stands on the curb with a tennis ball. The first person throws the ball at the opposite curb. If it hits and rebounds it is a "Curby".
